item.title: First reading, referred to Labor & Commerce.
item.description: First reading, referred to Labor & Commerce.

item.title: 👎💵Scott Hazlegrove - WA Beer & Wine Distributors Association
item.description: Scott Hazlegrove signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent WA Beer & Wine Distributors Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍David Parker - I, America
item.description: David Parker signed up to testify Pro.

item.title: 👍Tom Wark - National Association of Wine Retailers
item.description: Tom Wark signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent National Association of Wine Retailers.

item.title: 👎Andrea McNeely - Association of Washington Spirits and Wine Distributors
item.description: Andrea McNeely signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Spirits and Wine Distributors.
